info.title: Software Platform API
info.description: Optional multiline or single-line description in [CommonMark](http://commonmark.org/help/) or HTML.

post.description: The client receives a Shared Access Signature that can be used to upload a file directly to the Azure Storage Blob Service.

X-Rate-Limit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

get.summary: Gets the list of categories supported by the system.
Gets a list of countries of the World with English dislay names and ISO country codes.
Gets a list of countries supported by the system, with English dislay names and ISO country codes.
Gets a paginated set of downloads records.
Returns information about the API itself.
Returns details about a release by id.

GenericError.description: This base error type is used for all raised exceptions.

AAD.description: Access token issued by Azure Active Directory.

AADB2C.description: Access token issued by Azure Active Directory B2C.
